main event: Observers reported seeing a light that changed colors and moved in various directions over Torrington, Connecticut, on February 8, 1967.
interesting points: The object was first seen in the southeast and moved to the northeast and then north,The light changed colors from white to red, white, and yellow and back to white,It was observed for 45 minutes,There were 2 confirmed witnesses,The conclusion of the sighting was noted as unidentified.
witness description: two observers who reported the sighting
